flawed_nl_solution:
Tim has 152 photos - 100 photos = <<152-100=52>>52 photos.
When Tim has 52 photos, then Paul has 52 + 10 photos = <<52+10=63>>63 photos.
Tim and Paul have together 52 photos + 63 photos = <<52+63=115>>115 photos.
That leaves Tom with 152 photos - 115 photos = <<152-115=37>>37 photos.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 62, not 63. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
